item.description:
Hi all -

Well I heard from 6 people ... 3 said yes and 3 said no.

So .... let's go for it! It'll be rainy day and after being in the house all day, let's get out and have some fun.

I'll be at Border Cafe around 6 pm. I'm doubting they take reservations. If they do, the table will be under my name .... Diane Darling.

Bring friends, RSVP (and PLEASE show up, don't cancel at 5 pm that day, just all that common sense stuff).

See you on Saturday .... cheers, Diane

p.s. My cell # is 617.308.0405. Please call or text if you are lost or have questions.
item.name: Border Cafe - Saturday night, April 17th
